TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit NodeLabelEditEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 提供有关 和 事件的数据。

span.span: Provides data for the and events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户完成为树节点编辑文本时发生此事件。The event occurs when the user finishes editing the text for a tree node. 当用户开始编辑树节点的文本时发生该事件。The event occurs when the user begins editing the text for a tree node. 对象指定要与树节点关联的新文本、包含要编辑的标签的树节点以及编辑操作是否已取消。A object specifies the new text to associate with the tree node, the tree node that contains the label to edit, and whether the edit operation has been canceled. 有关处理事件的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例允许用户使用编辑 nonroot 树节点。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标时, 位于该位置的将确定并存储在一个名为`mySelectedNode`的变量中。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了 nonroot 树节点, 则会将其置于可编辑状态, 从而允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后, 将计算并保存新的标签文本。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 在此示例中, 多个字符在标签文本中被视为无效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果标签字符串中有一个无效字符, 或者字符串为空, 则会向用户发送错误通知, 并将标签返回到其之前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例允许用户使用编辑 nonroot 树节点。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标时, 位于该位置的将确定并存储在一个名为`mySelectedNode`的变量中。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了 nonroot 树节点, 则会将其置于可编辑状态, 从而允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后, 将计算并保存新的标签文本。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 在此示例中, 多个字符在标签文本中被视为无效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果标签字符串中有一个无效字符, 或者字符串为空, 则会向用户发送错误通知, 并将标签返回到其之前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取与树节点关联的新文本。

span.span: Gets the new text to associate with the tree node.

value.span: 表示新 标签的字符串值或 （如果用户取消编辑）。

span.span: The string value that represents the new label or if the user cancels the edit.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值是: `null`如果用户按 ESC 取消编辑, 或按 ENTER 而不修改标签文本, 则为。The value of this property is `null` if the user presses ESC to cancel the edit or presses ENTER without modifying the label text. 如果用户编辑标签文本, 则此属性的值为新的标签文本。If the user edits the label text, the value of this property is the new label text. 即使已编辑标签文本的最终值与原始值相同, 也是如此。This is true even if the final value of edited label text is the same as its original value. ## Examples 下面的示例允许用户使用编辑 nonroot 树节点。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标时, 位于该位置的将确定并存储在一个名为`mySelectedNode`的变量中。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了 nonroot 树节点, 则会将其置于可编辑状态, 从而允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后, 将计算并保存新的标签文本。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 在此示例中, 多个字符在标签文本中被视为无效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果标签字符串中有一个无效字符, 或者字符串为空, 则会向用户发送错误通知, 并将标签返回到其之前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text. [!code-cpp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[classic treenode.beginedit example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic TreeNode.BeginEdit Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例允许用户使用编辑 nonroot 树节点。The following example allows the user to edit nonroot tree nodes by using a . 当用户右键单击鼠标时, 位于该位置的将确定并存储在一个名为`mySelectedNode`的变量中。When the user right clicks the mouse, the at that position is determined and stored in a variable named `mySelectedNode`. 如果选择了 nonroot 树节点, 则会将其置于可编辑状态, 从而允许用户编辑节点标签。If a nonroot tree node was selected, it is put into an editable state, allowing the user to edit the node label. 用户停止编辑树节点标签后, 将计算并保存新的标签文本。After the user stops editing the tree node label, the new label text is evaluated and saved. 在此示例中, 多个字符在标签文本中被视为无效。For this example, several characters are considered not valid in the label text. 如果标签字符串中有一个无效字符, 或者字符串为空, 则会向用户发送错误通知, 并将标签返回到其之前的文本。If one of the invalid characters is in the label string, or the string is empty, the user is notified of the error and the label is returned to its previous text.
